p.k: A male lion resumes his former role as leader, while a younger animal is evicted from the pride and faces an uncertain future
The documentary highlights astonishing animal antics, including the greatest escape acts, most unpredictable tricks and strangest natural instincts
Vets at zoos and clinics treat all kinds of felines, from everyday house cats to like tigers, leopards, lions and lynx
Stories of vets taking care of orphaned wild animals, from bear cubs and baby deer, to a manatee that has been rescued, rehabilitated, and released into the wild
Springtime brings a baby boom for vets at clinics and zoos across the US. In Alaska, it's all hands on deck when an injured baby fox is rushed into Dr Oakley's clinic
Documentary exploring unusual friendships between humans and animals, including a deer that befriended two people and a cat, and a boy who bonded with a Cape buffalo
Part two of a two-part special. More highlights from the series, including deadly black mambas in wardrobes and spitting cobras in factories
85% A lioness must choose between her pride's safety and her own freedom
85% The forest residents turn on orphaned leopard Motsidi. Meanwhile, the hyenas cause havoc, exploiting African wild dog Mogolo's weakening state
85% Lioness Tsebe holds the Northern Brothers at bay until they prove worthy to father her new dynasty
The programme exploring unlikely animal pairings returns, beginning with a two-legged Chihuahua that has befriended a silkie chicken, a mountaineer
83% A female hyena whose mother was a dominant member of the pack must assert her position in the fiercely competitive group
Discover a side to sharks you've never seen before and take a deep dive, from the sunny beach to the 8000-foot abyss, to see how extreme adaptation
Wildlife experts Dr Mike Heithaus and Dr James Nifong draw on evidence from around the world to judge what would happen in a crocodile fought a shark
Shark experts set out to uncover what exactly makes the powerful bites of great whites, tigers and bulls so deadly, and whether jaw strength or sharp teeth
Divers embark on a mission to free sharks and turtles from illegal fishing lines off the coast of mainland Costa Rica
Documentary exploring why species of sharks that have always been solitary predators have adapted to work in packs to catch their prey
A mysterious series of shark attacks off the New Jersey shore in 1916 in which five people were attacked and all but one died
Experts investigate a series of attacks of the shore of Cape Cod in 2017 and 2018, including the first shark fatality in Massachusetts in more than 80 years
85% A lioness must choose between her pride's safety and her own freedom
85% The forest residents turn on orphaned leopard Motsidi. Meanwhile, the hyenas cause havoc, exploiting African wild dog Mogolo's weakening state
